# abs()

**Instance Method**

Computes the absolute of the tensor’s elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func abs() -> MLTensor
```

## Computing the absolute, ceiling and floor

- **ceil()**: Computes the ceiling of the tensor’s elements.
- **floor()**: Computes the floor of the tensor’s elements.

items.description: Computes the floor of the tensor’s elements.
